title: node:DEVICE.ETHMODEL1
description: Schema of a generic Ethernet DEVICE model.

protocol.description: Protocol of the node. It should be generated by the schema default values and not appear in the input payload JSON.

type.description: Type of the node. It should be a form data argument `node_type` and not appear in the input payload JSON.

model.description: Category of the node. It should be a form data argument `model` and not appear in the input payload JSON.

ports.description: Physical ports of the node, it should be generated by the schema default values and not appear in the input payload JSON.

protocol.description: Protocol of the link that connects to the port.

IP.$comment: The regex is from this answer https://stackoverflow.com/a/106223
IP.description: IPV4 address of the node. According to dotted-quad ABNF syntax as defined in RFC 2673, section 3.2.

MAC.$comment: The regex is from this answer https://stackoverflow.com/a/55532861. Note that the answer has a small mistake.
MAC.description: MAC address of the node. It should be six groups of two hexadecimal digits, separated by hyphens (-) or colon (:).
